General.Name: Topicus.com Inc
General.Description: Topicus.com Inc. provides vertical market software and vertical market platforms in Europe. The company develops, installs, and customizes software, as well as provides related professional services and support for customers across approximately 20 diverse markets primarily in Europe; and acquires, builds, and manages industry specific software businesses, which offer software solutions that address the particular needs of customers. It serves education, healthcare, social services, local and central government, retail, financial services and accountancy, legal services, real estate, automotive, maritime, and professional associations. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 20 Adelaide Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 2T6
